title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4215.2 - Result commission, totalizators required
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4215.2 - Result commission, totalizators required

State Regulations

All race tracks under the jurisdiction of the commission
are required to install and maintain mechanically operated totalizators and
result commissions in plain view of patrons. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4215.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
